show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

header.title: Innovative Approaches to Mental Health Problems

title: Innovative Approaches to Mental Health Problems
content: My guest, Bob Nikkel, former director of mental health and addictions for the State of Oregon, talks with me about... <!--more--> innovative approaches to serious mental health problems including family interventions for early psychosis and dual diagnosis twelve step programs that actually succeed in helping recovery.
